description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for authentication-related endpoints, including user registration, login, and MFA enablement. It includes route documentation for OpenAPI specification and interacts with authService and middleware modules.

methods.name: POST /api/auth/register
methods.description: Handles user registration requests, validates input, and calls authService.register.

methods.name: POST /api/auth/login
methods.description: Handles login requests, validates input, and calls authService.login.

methods.name: POST /api/auth/mfa
methods.description: Enables MFA for authenticated users by calling authService.enableMfa.
